list.content: org $7c00stimov dword [4*0x09], inte;push word [dword 0x100000]jmp $inte:mov ax, $b800mov ds, axmov [ds:0], word $0723jmp $align 512store word $aa55 at $-2db 0x100000-512 dup 0按按钮会提示#。org $7c0
